@graph.name: scRNA Plant Analysis
@graph.description:
Downstream Single-cell RNA Plant analysis with ScanPy

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Analysis of plant scRNA-Seq Data with Scanpy](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/single-cell/tutorials/scrna-plant/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
